description: You guessed it; Damask is back in style! Time to blend right into Grandma’s sofa. Spandex woven throughout the sock supports your legs providing an extra spring in your step. Merino wool blend regulates temperature.Turn welt cuff hold the sock in place all day.Graduated compression increases circulation for less swelling, fatigue and stiffness.Arch support for added comfortSeamless toe closure.Moderate 15-20mmHG compression helps fend off fatigue.Women's size S/M fits US 4-7.5 or EU 35-38. M/L fits US 8-10.5 or EU 39-43.
name: Sockwell Damask Compression Socks - Women's
